00296 typedef enum opennsl_vlan_control_e {
00297     opennslVlanDropUnknown = 0,         
00299     opennslVlanShared = 3,              
00300     opennslVlanSharedID = 4,            
00301     opennslVlanTranslate = 5,           
00302     opennslVlanIgnorePktTag = 6,        
00304     opennslVlanMemberMismatchToCpu = 21 
00307 } opennsl_vlan_control_t;
